mapper.select: select distinct 病名.disease_name as disease_name from diagnose 診断 inner join disease_master 病名 on 診断.disease_id = 病名.id where ( #{kettochi} >= (select sub1.base_value from diagnose sub1 where sub1.diagnostic_id = 1 and 診断.disease_id = sub1.disease_id) and #{hba1c} >= (select sub1.base_value from diagnose sub1 where sub1.diagnostic_id = 2 and 診断.disease_id = sub1.disease_id) ) OR ( ( 診断.diagnostic_id = 3 and #{syusyuku} >= 診断.base_value ) or ( 診断.diagnostic_id = 4 and #{kakutyo} >= 診断.base_value ) ) OR ( ( 診断.diagnostic_id = 5 and 診断.base_value > #{hdl} ) or ( 診断.diagnostic_id = 6 and #{ldl} >= 診断.base_value ) or ( 診断.diagnostic_id = 7 and #{tg} >= 診断.base_value ) )
